message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. After careful consideration of its value and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a price of $20000 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the potential return on investment for you. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for both of us to achieve our goals. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you've placed on the product, $20000 is a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'd be happy to purchase the product for $15000.  This price reflects the value I see in the product while remaining within my financial constraints.  Let me know your thoughts.
